author: sucy
title: Virtual Billboard
description: People are buying land and more on the blockchain. Users can advertise these assets and more within the Metaverse with virtual billboards.
solution: We will develop a programmatic ad selling platform with bespoke settings where buyers can advertise assets and services virtually.
experience: Our team has over 12 yrs of experience developing high-end, interactive DOOH advertisement software and managing Times Square ad campaigns.
